main event: On 17 August 1952, Capt. Henry J. Hill observed a disc-shaped unidentified object traveling at a high speed near Webb AFB, Texas.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 50-60 feet in diameter and was visible for approximately 40 seconds., The object climbed at a constant rate and disappeared after traveling about 20 miles., It was deduced that the object was under intelligent control and performed maneuvers not known to present-day aircraft., No sound was reported during the sighting, and weather conditions were clear with excellent visibility., The sighting was recorded by a trained pilot, adding credibility to the observation.
witness description: Capt. Henry J. Hill, Serial No. 0812359, of the 3700th Pilot Training Squadron
